snippet.title: CyberSeas Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Releasing 9th December 2024
Wishlist on Steam today!

Welcome to the CyberSeas! A supermassive meteorite disaster has flooded the Earth. Cyber pirates rule the remains of civilization and race around in futuristic jet ships. Become the greatest cyber pirate to ever sail the CyberSeas!

CyberSeas is a momentum-filled boat racing and exploration game. Pilot a jet ship equipped with a harpoon, grappling and swinging around sunken skyscrapers. Complete missions for a colourful cast of characters, including competing in races, finding lost treasure, performing tricks, and more! Build your reputation and show everyone you’re the greatest cyber pirate around. With three unique levels to explore, the residents of the CyberSeas will be sure to make your stay worthwhile.
